Hello,

My product is iPhone 13 Pro, which has the above problem:

Hello, unfortunately, the battery loses its performance extremely quickly despite having 100% capacity. What can we do?

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

here the claim from the customer:


I have now tested the phone for a few days and observed the battery life and the decrease in percentages and unfortunately this drops quite quickly with normal use. e.g.: a phone call of about 30 minutes immediately drains 10-15% battery; navigation 30-40% - if it just lies there, about 5% is lost per hour. I understand of course that it is a used phone - but so far I have not had such experiences with your devices. Is there anything I can do or you can recommend? 

Regards,
Fatma from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We apologise for the inconvenience caused. We would like to offer a commercial gesture of 20 euros to the customer for this inconvenience caused. The customer can use the 20 euros to offset the cost if they ever decide to visit a neighbourhood repair shop to resolve the issue. It also avoids the hassle of deleting all personal data just for a battery repair when returning the phone and saves the world from harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers when transporting the device back to our facility. 
A battery is easy to replace and most shops would be able to do it so you can protect the data within your device instead of a return.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile

here the message from the customer:

Since I don't have a replacement device (anymore) (because I've already sent you the old one :)), sending it in is not so feasible.
At the same time, I've seen that a battery replacement costs around €100 in the Apple shop itself - perhaps the dealer would like to check his options again? Maybe he also has a certified partner company in Hamburg or Kiel that could do the repair?

Regards,
Fatma from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We would like to offer a commercial gesture of 55 euros instead to the customer for this inconvenience caused. 

A battery is easy to replace and most shops would be able to do it so the customer does not necesarily have to go to an Apple shop, but rather a more affordable neighbourhood mobile repair shop instead. Furthermore, it can protect the data within the customer's device.

Please check if the customer is agreeable to this.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile

the customer agrees the 55,00€
